entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
